description.lang: MH6-HP programmable thermostat is a Z-Wave Plus enabled device for indoor temperature control. It is mainly applied to heat pump system for heating/cooling, with 3 modes easily switchable: Schedule, Hold and Holiday. The device is of high reliability and practicability, and it can support up to 3H/2C system. This product can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from any other manufacturers.
